lines.text: [Now in 1986, Biggles has climbed behind the controls of a police helicopter]
You can't fly this. You don't know how.
If you can fly a Sopwith Camel, you can fly anything.
[Debbie and Chuck enter Jim's hotel room to find Jim dressed as a nun, and with a gun on the chair]
Religious Transvestite Bank robber. That one's not even in the book.

[Debbie and Jim have traveled back in time to 1917]
Jim, this is all a big put on, isn't it? Like Fantasy Island, right?
Come on, Debbie, it's not *that* bad. It's only World War I.
[Biggles and the others have reached the area used for testing the weapon]

[looking around]
Looks like this place was nuked!

[Looks at Ferguson]
Nuked? What's that?
American slang word. It means... to overeact.
Quick! Untie us before they realise you're not a God, you're just an American.
What did they train you for?
Cooking!
[Biggles and Jim have returned to 1917 in the helicopter, and have been spotted by Von Stalhein]
Let's show this sausage guzzler what this thing can do.
Go for it.
You see, Biggles is your Time-Twin.
Time-Twin? Do you have anything stronger than coffee?

[Flying the helicopter]
Clever! The blades can be tilted to create an airscrew effect.
